job description:
Under minimal supervision, responsible for building and managing a new organization established as a therapeutic product accelerator program at the University of Utah from the ground up. Responsible for program design and project management as well as managing administrative, financial, personnel, and organizational functions. Provides strategic leadership and hands-on tactical expertise to advance the mission and goals of the organization. Will be responsible for building a strong team and quickly delivering results. Acts as a catalyst between the department and its stakeholders to ensure meaningful communication, sound reporting, and accountability.

A science background is needed as well as proven skills in project management in a high visibility, high stakes venture. Must be adept at building strategic partnerships, driving projects to completion, communicating results in a clear and effective manner and must have the ability to guide a vision with laser focus towards success.
